column5: I would like to thank all the well wishers the op went well and am getting around with a walker now. thanks to all
Good to hear your feeling better !!
Very good news indeed! You could sell your guns now. You won't be needing them cause I reckon that with the bionic parts, you'll be running down your game.
Glad to hear you are home and getting about. Just take her slow and easy, assuming of course that's how she likes it.
Glad to hear you are feeling better.  Joey
and i thought this was going to be a thread about DIVORCE..  ...but glad to hear your feeling better ...

Good to hear it all went well , just do what the therapist tells you and you will be as good as new in no time . I had a great lady came to the house three days a week for the first 6 weeks , . Its been a little over 8 months for me and I cant wait untill new years day to finally get to do some fishing again, and I hope to get the boat up and running next spring, first year in almost 25 that I didnt charter  . Good luck and tight lines .. Capt
